latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: Camp Operator fails to developed and implemented Written Safety Plan Plan not reviewd and updated annually Plan not approved by DOHMH does not comply with health code and 7-25 of State Sanitary Code
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Record of child medical exam within one year of admision not on file Record incomplete fails to contain medical history recommendations for special conditions current immunization contact information for each child
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: All camp staff have not had recent medical exam including TB testing as required by the Dept
Parental authorization for camp to respond to emergencies as appropriate in absence of parental contact not on file
